item.title: Digital Multimeter
item.description: You need to know The following products are just one of our many models. If the product does not meet your requirements, please contact sales in time to obtain a more matching model. Introduction Functions: DC current / AC current / AC voltage / DC voltage / Capacitance / Resistance / On-off / Transistor / Zero live wire / Diode Intelligent anti-burn, overload protection: It has dislocation anti-burning and overload protection to prevent misoperation and burnout.
